pages.title: The Heart
pages.text: $(b)Take the place between breaths$() and trace the $(gold)Circle$().$(br)With the $(item)Barrier Seal$(), bind its Name; with $(item)sanctified chalk$(), seal its edge.$(br2)The Circle is a covenantâ€”make no mark in haste.

pages.title: The Wardens
pages.text: Plant the four $(thing)Wardens$() upon the Cross of the World, each $(gold)five strides$() from the Heart.$(br)Give heed to the compass, for a Warden misplaced shall answer no call.

pages.title: The Sign Above
pages.text: Where the rite is true, the firmament mirrors the earth: a sigil vast turns above the Circle, discerned by those who draw near.
